sections.title: Runeguard (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Runeguard class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Rune Magic (Runeguard)
sections.description: Adds all spells with 'glyph' or 'symbol' in their name to the runeguard's class spell list.

sections.title: Virtuous Rune (Su) (Runeguard)
sections.description: Allows the runeguard to use beneficial rune abilities based on seven virtues, each with unique effects like spell transfer, enhanced healing, or temporary bonuses.

sections.title: Rune Mastery (Su) (Runeguard)
sections.description: Grants the ability to cast permanency as a spell-like ability once per day, but can only maintain one permanent effect at a time.
